TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed PackUriHelper extends System.Object
public ref class PackUriHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供实用工具方法来撰写和分析 pack URI 对象。

span.span: Provides utility methods to compose and parse pack URI objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int ComparePackUri (Uri firstPackUri, Uri secondPackUri);
.method public static hidebysig int32 ComparePackUri(class System.Uri firstPackUri, class System.Uri secondPackUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function ComparePackUri (firstPackUri As Uri, secondPackUri As Uri) As Integer
public: static int ComparePackUri(Uri ^ firstPackUri, Uri ^ secondPackUri);

span.span: The first pack URI.
The second pack URI.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示两个包 URI 是否等效。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether two pack URIs are equivalent.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示 和 之间的关系。

span.span: A signed integer indicating the relationship between and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果这两个`firstPackUri`和`secondPackUri`是`null`，返回 0。If both `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are `null`, returns 0. 当比较包 Uri 时，null URI 将始终小于非 null URI。When comparing pack URIs, a null URI is always less than a non-null URI. 用例其中`firstPackUri`和`secondPackUri`是绝对同时包 Uri，执行比较。For cases where `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are both absolute pack URIs, performs the comparison.

span.span: Either or is not an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
-or-
Either or do not begin with a "pack://" scheme.

public: static int ComparePartUri(Uri ^ firstPartUri, Uri ^ secondPartUri);

The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the second .

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示两个包部件 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] 是否相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether two package part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] are equivalent.

returns.span: 一个值，指示 和 之间的关系。

span.span: A value that indicates the relationship between and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果这两个`firstPartUri`和`secondPartUri`是`null`，返回 0。If both `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are `null`, returns 0. 比较时 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]，null[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]将始终小于非 null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。When comparing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)], a null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] is always less than a non-null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]. 用例其中`firstPartUri`和`secondPartUri`都是相对Uri，执行比较。For cases where `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are both relative URIs, performs the comparison.

exception.span: 或 不是有效部件 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 语法。

span.span: or is not a valid part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] syntax.
Creates a new pack URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表说明了样本事例方法。The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`|返回的包 URIReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml/%41/%61.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page5.xaml/a/page5.xaml|#summary#summary|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summarypack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| |http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null****null**|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|**null****null**|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xamlpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|#xref#xref|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xrefpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| 撰写包 URI 是一个多步骤过程。Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. 例如，构成包 URI 中的一个步骤是将正斜杠 （/） 字符的`packageUri`用逗号 （，）。For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). 字符串转换和包 Uri 的形成方式的详细信息，请参阅附录 A.4"字符串转换示例"和附录 B.3"撰写包 URI"中下载的开放式打包约定规范[规范和许可证下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri Create (Uri packageUri);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri Create(class System.Uri packageUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create (packageUri As Uri) As Uri
public: static Uri ^ Create(Uri ^ packageUri);

span.span: The URI of the referenced .

summary.span: 创建一个指向包的新包 URI。

span.span: Creates a new pack URI that points to a package.

returns.span: 由给定的 引用的 的包 URI。

span.span: The pack URI for the referenced by the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` 不能指定为`null`或为空。`packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty. 下表说明了样本事例。The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packageUri`|返回的包 URIReturned pack URI| |------------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abcpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|pack://file:、、 d:,packages,mypackage2.pkgpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg| 撰写包 URI 是一个多步骤过程。Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. 例如，构成包 URI 中的一个步骤是将正斜杠 （/） 字符的`packageUri`用逗号 （，）。For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). 字符串转换和包 Uri 的形成方式的详细信息，请参阅附录 A.4"字符串转换示例"和附录 B.3"撰写包 URI"中下载的开放式打包约定规范[规范和许可证下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法用来定义包引用包的 URI。The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the in the package.

summary.span: 已知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 及包中部件的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] URI。

span.span: Creates a pack URI given a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] and the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a part in the package.
The pack URI of the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` 不能指定为 null 或为空。`packageUri` may not be specified as null or empty. 如果`partUri`是`null`，返回的包 URI 指向包。If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package. 下表说明了样本事例方法。The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|返回的包 URIReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml/%41/%61.xml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xamlpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml| 撰写包 URI 是一个多步骤过程。Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. 例如，构成包 URI 中的一个步骤是将正斜杠 （/） 字符的`packageUri`用逗号 （，）。For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). 字符串转换和包 Uri 的形成方式的详细信息，请参阅附录 A.4"字符串转换示例"和附录 B.3"撰写包 URI"中下载的开放式打包约定规范[规范和许可证下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法用来定义包引用包的 URI。The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

public: static Uri ^ Create(Uri ^ packageUri, Uri ^ partUri, System::String ^ fragment);

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the .
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the in the package.

param.name: fragment
param.span: 标识包部件中的元素的“#”引用。

span.span: A "#" reference identifying an element within the package part.

summary.span: 在给定 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]、包中部件的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 以及要追加的“#”片段的情况下创建包 URI。

span.span: Creates a pack URI given a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a part in the package, and a "#" fragment to append.

returns.span: 标识指定包、包部件和片段的包 URI。

span.span: The pack URI that identifies the specified package, package part, and fragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` 不能指定为`null`或为空。`packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty. 如果`partUri`是`null`，返回的包 URI 指向包。If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package. `fragment` 不能为空字符串，但可以指定为`null`。`fragment` cannot be an empty string but can be specified as `null`. 如果未指定为`null`、`fragment`字符串必须以 '#' 字符开头。When not specified as `null`, the `fragment` string must begin with a '#' character. 有关语法的详细信息`fragment`引用，请参阅"片段"3.5 节的[RFC 3986](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt)。For more information of the syntax of `fragment` references, see Section 3.5 "Fragment" of [RFC 3986](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt). 下表说明了样本事例方法。The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`|返回的包 URIReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml/%41/%61.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page5.xaml/a/page5.xaml|#summary#summary|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summarypack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| |http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null****null**|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|**null****null**|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xamlpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|#xref#xref|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xrefpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| 撰写包 URI 是一个多步骤过程。Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. 例如，构成包 URI 中的一个步骤是将正斜杠 （/） 字符的`packageUri`用逗号 （，）。For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). 字符串转换和包 Uri 的形成方式的详细信息，请参阅附录 A.4"字符串转换示例"和附录 B.3"撰写包 URI"中下载的开放式打包约定规范[规范和许可证下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法用来定义包引用包的 URI。The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

span.span: The URI of the within the package.
Creates a formatted URI.
A formatted URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的始终从引用根。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a is always referenced from the root. 返回URI 是一个绝对路径，它开始时始终具有"/"并且符合在中定义的语法[打开打包约定规范](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。The returned URI is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). 下表说明了样本事例。The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`partUri`|返回的 URI 一部分Returned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |picture1.jpgpicture1.jpg|/picture1.jpg/picture1.jpg| |/picture2.jpg/picture2.jpg|/picture2.jpg/picture2.jpg| |a/mydoc.xamla/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml| |/b/bar.xaml/b/bar.xaml|/b/bar.xaml/b/bar.xaml| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法用来定义相对 Uri元素。The following example shows how to use the method to define relative URIs for elements. [!code-csharp[PackageWrite#PackageWriteCreatePartUri](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageWrite/CSharp/PackageWrite.cs#packagewritecreateparturi)] [!code-vb[PackageWrite#PackageWriteCreatePartUri](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageWrite/visualbasic/packagewrite.vb#packagewritecreateparturi)]

span.span: The URI to normalize.

summary.span: 返回指定 URI 的规范化形式。

span.span: Returns the normalized form of a specified URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表说明了样本事例。The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packUri`|返回的包 URIReturned Package URI| |---------------|--------------------------| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.xyz| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?mypackage| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg| |pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpgpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc| |pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri GetPartUri (Uri packUri);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri GetPartUri(class System.Uri packUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetPartUri (packUri As Uri) As Uri
public: static Uri ^ GetPartUri(Uri ^ packUri);

param.name: packUri
param.span: 包 URI，根据其返回 URI。

span.span: The pack URI from which to return the URI.

summary.span: 返回指定包 URI 内的 的 URI。

span.span: Returns the URI of a within a specified pack URI.

returns.span: 给定 中 的 URI，或者，如果 指向包而不是 ，则为 。

span.span: The URI of the in the given , or if points to a package instead of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回URI 是相对于包根，始终为绝对路径，则会启动与"/"并且符合在中定义的语法[打开打包约定规范](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。The returned URI is relative to the package root and is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). 下表说明了样本事例。The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packUri`|返回的 URI 一部分Returned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|nullnull| |pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpgpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|/a/picture.jpg/a/picture.jpg| |pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|

remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` 必须确定是（"/"） 或不一部分。`partUri` must identify either the ("/") or a that is not a part. 有关详细信息部件，请参阅下载打开打包约定规范中的部分 9.3"关系"[规范和许可证下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information about parts, see Section 9.3 "Relationships" in the Open Packaging Conventions Specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples [WPF 中的 Pack URIPack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md) [开放式打包约定规范Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关系部件的属性必须确定是（"/"） 或不。The property of a relationship part must identify either the ("/") or a that is not a . 例如，如果包部件"/ files/document.xaml"是关系一部分的源所有者"/ files/_rels/document.xaml.rels"，则调用与`relationshipPartUri`参数"/ files/_rels/document.xaml.rels"返回的"/ files/document.xaml"。For example, if the package part "/files/document.xaml" is the source owner of the relationship part "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels", calling with the `relationshipPartUri` parameter of "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels" returns the of "/files/document.xaml".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表说明了样本事例。The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`sourcePartUri`|`targetUri`|返回的 URIReturned URI| |---------------------|-----------------|------------------| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|picture.jpgpicture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|images/picture.jpgimages/picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/images/picture.jpg/mydoc/markup/images/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|./picture.jpg./picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|../picture.jpg../picture.jpg|/mydoc/picture.jpg/mydoc/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|../images/picture.jpg../images/picture.jpg|/mydoc/images/picture.jpg/mydoc/images/picture.jpg| |/|images/picture.jpgimages/picture.jpg|/images/picture.jpg/images/picture.jpg| ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. 有关完整的示例，请参阅[读取包的示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160034)。For the complete sample, see [Reading a Package Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160034).
